messages.subject: New Shinsengumi Manga focus on Saito Hajime and Hijikata in Aizu
messages.msgSnippet: http://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2012-11-10/otomen-aya-kanno-to-launch-shinsengumi-manga Kanno first delved into the Shinsengumi with her Hokusō
messages.messageBody:
http://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2012-11-10/otomen-aya-kanno-to-launch-shinsengumi-manga

"Kanno first delved into the Shinsengumi with her Hokusō Shinsengumi manga, and it has been eight years since her last Shinsengumi manga, Kōtetsu no Hana. The new story will be set in the Aizu region of northern Japan."

It's about time.

Many Shinsengumi or the group formerly known officially as the Shinsengumi headed to Aizu and did its part to defend the feud.
